thread.title: Divine in every way
thread.title_full: Divine in every way - Review of W New York - Union Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: xxnaughtyboyxx
title: Divine in every way
text:
What a fantastic hotel! Location is great, right on Union Square, the building is a beautiful old NYC style beauty which has been done up in a modern but, appropriate for the style, way. The room I had was about level 7 and had fantastic views of the square, was huge with double height ceilings and a comfortable bed, was clean and well appointed. Service was excellent and the bar and restaurant on the ground floor were a great place to hang out, meet friends, grab a bar meal and have a tap beer. Overall one of the best hotels I have stayed in and cant fault it in any way
Room Tip: Any room facing Union Square See more room tips
